article.headline: Aon board hikes dividend 5%
article.body: Aon PLC AON, +0.53% said late Friday that its board is raising the professional services company’s dividend by 5%. Aon said the board authorized a quarterly dividend of 46 cents a share, up from 44 cents a share, to be paid Nov. 13 to shareholders of record as of Nov. 2. Aon shares were flat after hours, following a 0.5% rise during the regular session to close at $209.19.
